com.compendium.ui.toolbars.system
Class UIToolBarImages

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.toolbars.system.UIToolBarImages

public class UIToolBarImages
extends java.lang.Object

This class has method for retrieving toolbar image files.

Author:
Michelle Bachler
